updater

Class Updater

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • updater.Updater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Updater
extends java.lang.Thread
    Version:
    30.11.2012
    This a updater for downloading one file and save it locally.
    Author:
    Kevin Weis

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE
      The bufferzize used to download the file.
      static int VERBOSE_COMBI
      Use this, will print for each loaded buffer a dot to the console and for each reached end of line the current percent to a new line and appand further dots.
      static int VERBOSE_DOTS
      Use this, will print for each loaded buffer a dot to the console.
      static int VERBOSE_PERCENTAGE
      Use this, will print for each percentual gained progress of the download the current percent to the console (does refresh the value, not write at a new line!).

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE
        The bufferzize used to download the file. Default value = 1024.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VERBOSE_COMBI

        public static final int VERBOSE_COMBI
        Use this, will print for each loaded buffer a dot to the console and for each reached end of line the current percent to a new line and appand further dots.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VERBOSE_DOTS

        public static final int VERBOSE_DOTS
        Use this, will print for each loaded buffer a dot to the console.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VERBOSE_PERCENTAGE

        public static final int VERBOSE_PERCENTAGE
        Use this, will print for each percentual gained progress of the download the current percent to the console (does refresh the value, not write at a new line!).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

       int setBufferSize)
        Parameters:

        saveTo - (as File) the file where the update will be saved at.
        setVerboseType - (as int) type of verbose output (see static int´s)

      • Updater

        public Updater(java.net.URL fromURL,
       java.io.File saveTo,
       int setVerboseType,
       boolean setVerbose,
       int setBufferSize,
       int newPriority)
        Parameters:
        fromURL - (as URL) the url where the new file version is located.
        saveTo - (as File) the file where the update will be saved at.
        setVerboseType - (as int) type of verbose output (see static int´s)
        setVerbose - (as boolean) if verbose informations will be shown or not.
        setBufferSize - (as int) the bufferzize used to download the file.
        newPriority - (as int) Changes the priority of this thread.
        First the checkAccess method of this thread is called with no arguments. This may result in throwing a SecurityException.

        Otherwise, the priority of this thread is set to the smaller of the specified newPriority and the maximum permitted priority of the thread's thread group.
